text: Terje Steen (13 January 1944 - 1 September 2020) was a Norwegian ice hockey player. He was born in Oslo, German-occupied Norway and represented the club Vålerengens IF. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1968 and 1972. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Ice hockey players at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Terje Steen
